name: Arco Ufficio
tagline: The office deserves better than capsules.
hero_image_alt: Arco Ufficio stainless steel espresso machine in a modern open-plan office kitchen, large 2.5-litre water tank visible through smoked glass, two espresso cups on the drip tray, clean industrial design with brushed metal surfaces, soft overhead lighting reflecting off the steel body
headline: Espresso at scale. Quality intact.
subheadline: A high-volume dual-boiler machine with a 2.5-litre tank and commercial-grade group head, designed for offices and shared spaces that refuse to compromise on coffee.
description_short: A high-volume dual-boiler espresso machine with a 2.5L tank and commercial group head, built for offices and shared spaces.
description_long: The Arco Ufficio was designed for the place where most people drink the most coffee — the office. Its 2.5-litre water tank and dual-boiler system handle back-to-back shots without temperature drop, whether you're making five cappuccinos for a morning meeting or pulling espressos throughout the day. The commercial-grade group head and 58mm portafilter mean the coffee itself is indistinguishable from what you'd get at a good café. A removable drip tray, auto-off timer, and easy-access descaling mode keep maintenance straightforward even when no single person is responsible for the machine.
use_case_headline: Perfect for offices, studios, and co-working spaces.
use_case_body: The Ufficio handles the volume of a busy office without the flavour compromises of pod machines. Its large tank, easy maintenance, and durable build mean it keeps running — even when 'someone else' was supposed to refill the water.

pairing_products.rationale: A stepless grinder that handles the variety of beans different team members might bring in.
A more accessible grinder option for offices that want simplicity.
Extra cleaning tablets and descaling solution to keep the machine in top shape with heavy use.
